android.car.media

类 CarMediaIntents

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.media.CarMediaIntents

  • public final class CarMediaIntents
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines media related intents (and their extras) for the car.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String ACTION_MEDIA_TEMPLATE
           * Activity Action: Provide media playing through a media template app
      static java.lang.String EXTRA_MEDIA_COMPONENT
      Used as a string extra field with ACTION_MEDIA_TEMPLATE to specify the MediaBrowserService that user wants to start the media on.
      static java.lang.String EXTRA_SEARCH_QUERY
      Used as a string extra field with ACTION_MEDIA_TEMPLATE to specify the search query to send either to the current MediaBrowserService or the one specified with EXTRA_MEDIA_COMPONENT.

    • 方法概要

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • ACTION_MEDIA_TEMPLATE

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_MEDIA_TEMPLATE
             * Activity Action: Provide media playing through a media template app.      *

        Input: these optional extras      *

      • EXTRA_MEDIA_COMPONENT
        •      *
      • EXTRA_SEARCH_QUERY
        •      *

        Output: nothing.

             * If no extra is specified, the current media source is opened.
